message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for a starting point.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice.  But I think a 55/45 split in my favor is more equitable.  After all, I'm the one taking the risk of rejecting your offer!

Bob, let's be realistic.  Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Time is literally money for me, and this back and forth only hurts us both. I propose a 50/50 split - a clean and fair resolution.
